issue.title: Platform fee calculation fail
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Platform fee calculation fails, either with overall platform fee or per category platform fee.

This ticket should be done after #1098

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Another defect is still there :

In the basket, when choosing a third party, the platfrom fee is calculated based on the its account (organism category). It is FALSE, the platform fee is always based on the client's category.
(this was already discussed with Jérôme V.)

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

I tested most of the cases, seem to work like it should !
Thank Hélène !
